body_html:
@Lewis-Liu : You seem to be using a customized installation process that does not work with pip. Simply downloading the file, renaming it to a .zip and using pip install on it will not work (for one, any dependencies will not be downloaded and installed).

Please use one of the supported installation procedures.

Unfortunately, we do not have the bandwidth to support customized installation processes. Sorry about that.

That said, the installation process does not require a UI, so you're good there :)

That said, the installation process does not require a UI, so you're good there :)
body:
@Lewis-Liu :  You seem to be using a customized installation process that does not work with pip. Simply downloading the file, renaming it to a `.zip` and using `pip install` on it will not work (for one, any dependencies will not be downloaded and installed). 

Please use one of the [supported installation procedures](https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.11/get_started/os_setup.html#download-and-setup).

Unfortunately, we do not have the bandwidth to support customized installation processes. Sorry about that.

That said, the installation process does not require a UI, so you're good there :)
